    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        public static String decrypt(String encryptedText,
                             String password)
                      throws EncryptionException
        Decrypts text and returns the readable clear text. If the encrypted input is blank then it is returned without processing.
        Parameters:
        encryptedText - the encrypted string (required)
        password - the password (required)
        Returns:
        the decrypted version of text
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - in the event of an encryption failure

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(String clearText,
                             String password)
                      throws EncryptionException
        Encrypt the clear text and adds a random salt. If the input text is blank then it is returned without processing.
        Parameters:
        clearText - the string to encrypt (required)
        password - the password (required)
        Returns:
        the encrypted version of the text
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - in the event of an encryption failure

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(String clearText,
                             String password,
                             byte[] salt)
                      throws EncryptionException
        Encrypt the clear text with a defined salt. If the input text is blank then it is returned without processing.
        Parameters:
        clearText - the string to encrypt (required)
        salt - a predefined salt added to the clear text (required)
        password - the password (required)
        Returns:
        the encrypted version of the text
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - in the event of an encryption failure

      • generateSalt

        public static byte[] generateSalt()
        Generates secure random bytes.
        Returns:
        a secure random salt with a size of bytes

      • generateSalt

        public static byte[] generateSalt(int saltSize)
        Generates secure random bytes.
        Parameters:
        saltSize - the length for the salt in bytes
        Returns:
        a secure random salt
        Since:
        3.5

      • getSalt

        public static String getSalt(String encryptedText)
        returns the stored salt (encoded) of a encrypted value
        Parameters:
        encryptedText - the encrypted text
        Returns:
        the salt of the encryption
